Detailed Description

Driver provides: use of cc1000 carrier sensing medium access control.

Driver requires: AVR architecture with cc1000 connected via SPI bus. This driver is mainly implemented on top of cc1000_defaults.

Note: To activate this routing protocol, the appropriate line in main.c must be uncommented along with commenting the other routing protocols.

Author:
Charles Gruenwald III, Jeff Rose
Date:
05/13/2004
